EmailTemplate.name: RE: Lisa Pritchard (1321287376.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Lisa Pritchard (1321287376.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Lisa,
I will send you the link to enroll in our system and you can navigate to our site to complete the enrollment when you are ready to do so. Since we wont be activating you until the end of the year it is not a big hurry to get this completed. Once you have finished the enrollment online there will be an enrollment packet you can print off and in that packet is an I9 form. You will just need to take this to a local notary and have them sign as an authorized representative and then fax or email the copy back to me. Once I have the I9 and your enrollment is complete I will just wait to activate you until your project starts. Please let me know if you have any questions about this.
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Lisa Pritchard [mailto:pritchard.lisa@rocketmail.com] Sent: Monday, November 14, 2011 11:12 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Lisa Pritchard
Thank you Nicolette! I just sent HPH a signed Business Associate Agreement, so I think the paperwork is all set now.
As far as any setup I need to do with MBO Partners, what would be the timing/process on that?
Thanks, Lisa
From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Monday, November 14, 2011 9:34 AM To: Grainger, Beth Cc: Lisa Pritchard Subject: RE: Lisa Pritchard
Hi Beth,
Here is the executed contract.
Thank you for your help with this!
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

Nicollette, Attached is the signed Agreement for Lisa Pritchard. Please have it signed on behalf of MBO Partners and return a fully executed copy to me via email or mail. My contact information is below.
Thanks, Beth
Beth Grainger| IT Business Analyst | Information Systems | Hawaii Pacific Health | 55 Merchant St. 23rd Floor, Honolulu, Hawaii, 96813 | (Office: (808) 535-7085| 2Fax: (808) 535-7002 | +bethg@kapiolani.org

Hi Beth,
Here you go. Please let me know if there is anything else you have questions about.
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

Nicolette,
Sorry to be nit-picky but can you change [Client] in the heading to Hawaii Pacific health and add Attn: Beth Grainger and 23rd Floor to the notices address and resend.
Thanks, Beth

Thank you and have a great evening, Nicolette

From: Grainger, Beth [mailto:BethG@kapiolani.org] Sent: Wednesday, November 09, 2011 2:07 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Chun, Marva Subject: RE: Lisa Pritchard
Nicolette,
or you can just make the following changes and resend the Agreement:
· change [CLIENT] to Hawaii Pacific Health at the top of the Agreement and on the signature block · fill in dated as of the _____ day of November, 2011 (the Effective Date) is made and entered into by and between Hawaii Pacific Health, · (Client), a corporation, having a place of business at 55 Merchant St., Honolulu, HI 96813. · Fill in Notices Address: Hawaii Pacific Health, 55 Merchant St. 27th Floor, Honolulu, HI 96813 · Underline heading in section 2 and 13 (for consistent format) · Can Section 23. Governing Law be changed to State of Hawaii? · Change revision dated on footer to current date.
Thanks, Beth
Beth Grainger| IT Business Analyst | Information Systems | Hawaii Pacific Health | 55 Merchant St. 23rd Floor, Honolulu, Hawaii, 96813 | (Office: (808) 535-7085| 2Fax: (808) 535-7002 | +bethg@kapiolani.org
From: Chun, Marva Sent: Wednesday, November 09, 2011 9:05 AM To: 'Nicolette Taylor' Cc: Grainger, Beth Subject: Lisa Pritchard
Nicolette, can you provide the MBO partners agreement in Word so that we can enter the client name, etc? Beth Grainger is our Contracts Administrator and she can work with you on finalizing this agreement.
Thank you, Marva
Marva Chun| Director, PMO |Project Management Office | Hawaii Pacific Health | 55 Merchant St. 23rd Floor, Honolulu, Hawaii, 96813 | (Office: (808) 535-7180| (Cell: (808) 228-1481 + marvac@kapiolani.org
